key.name: position
key.description: Position of the indicator in the panel.

key.name: offset
key.description: Index offset of the indicator in the panel box.

key.name: update-interval
key.description: Interval in milliseconds for updating the playback position.

key.name: only-show-translation
key.description: If enabled, only show the translation part of the lyrics (text after two consecutive spaces).

key.name: lyric-files
key.description: Array of JSON configuration file paths, each containing mappings from song titles to lyric file paths.
